bank.name: CND
bank.info: Simulated CND Hit Information True values

column.name: pid
column.info: ID of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: mpid
column.info: ID of the mother of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: tid
column.info: Track ID of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: mtid
column.info: Track ID of the mother of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: otid
column.info: Track ID of the original track that generated the first particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: trackE
column.info: Energy of the track

column.name: totEdep
column.info: Total Energy Deposited

column.name: avgX
column.info: Average X position in global reference system

column.name: avgY
column.info: Average Y position in global reference system

column.name: avgZ
column.info: Average Z position in global reference system

column.name: avgLx
column.info: Average X position in local reference system

column.name: avgLy
column.info: Average Y position in local reference system

column.name: avgLz
column.info: Average Z position in local reference system

column.name: px
column.info: x component of momentum of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: py
column.info: y component of momentum of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: pz
column.info: z component of momentum of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: vx
column.info: x component of primary vertex of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: vy
column.info: y component of primary vertex of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: vz
column.info: z component of primary vertex of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: mvx
column.info: x component of primary vertex of the mother of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: mvy
column.info: y component of primary vertex of the mother of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: mvz
column.info: z component of primary vertex of the mother of the particle entering the sensitive volume

column.name: avgT
column.info: Average time

column.name: nsteps
column.info: Number of steps

column.name: procID
column.info: Process ID

column.name: hitn
column.info: Hit1 Number

column.name: component
column.info: component number

column.name: ADCL
column.info: ADC Left

column.name: ADCR
column.info: ADC Right

column.name: TDCL
column.info: TDC Left

column.name: TDCR
column.info: TDC Right

column.name: hitn
column.info: hit number

column.name: Tof
column.info: Time of flight to CND hit-position

column.name: E
column.info: Reconstructed energy deposit

column.name: Z
column.info: Z co-ordinate of the hit position, w.r.t. Central Detector center

column.name: X
column.info: X co-ordinate of the hit position, w.r.t. Central Detector center

column.name: Y
column.info: Y co-ordinate of the hit position, w.r.t. Central Detector center

column.name: R
column.info: Radial distance from beam axis to hit position

column.name: phi
column.info: Azimuthal angle (around beam axis) of the hit position

column.name: layer
column.info: layer number

column.name: paddle
column.info: paddle number

column.name: indexD
column.info: Index of reconstructed direct hit in the individual TDC/ADC signal array (for real data: CND Bank, starting at 0)

column.name: indexI
column.info: Index of reconstructed indirect hit in the individual TDC/ADC signal array (for real data: CND Bank, starting at 0)

column.name: MCflag
column.info: MC flag. 1 (-1): correct (incorrect) matching of hits, 0: real data

column.name: MCE
column.info: MC energy deposited in hit

column.name: MCt
column.info: MC time of hit

column.name: MCx
column.info: MC x-position of hit (w.r.t. Central Detector center)

column.name: MCy
column.info: MC y-position of hit (w.r.t. Central Detector center)

column.name: MCz
column.info: MC z-position of hit (w.r.t. Central Detector center)
